title: Have a Meal Before You Go - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Cooking   Dragons   Dungeons   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Restaurant   Returning from Another World   Store Owner
author: Go Du Yul   고두열
description:
Becoming this world’s strongest person and returning in 30 years.

What is this world? The Earth I returned to is in the Era of Raids!

However, I’m now tired. I’ve retired and I want live while having a restaurant.

In the most “ordinary” way.>
